name: Devil faces (Demo version)
description:
It so happened in the world that the devil has many faces: clowns, jokes, faceless and others.

  It's not news that some people are obsessed with this and for them have created a special mental hospital - the House of Scream.

Devil faces tells a horror story in which something beaten by various experiments escapes from its chamber. A creature from the special building of ward No. 514, which cut out its family in the mask of the Face of the Devil.

The game has a choice of your devil, so you can choose from whose hands you want to die.

  • W, A, S, D - move
  • Space - jump
  • E - action
  • Q - flashlight
